trans-unit.source: Configuring the web server

seg-source.mrk: Configuring the web server

target.mrk: Den Webserver konfigurieren

trans-unit.source: Installing Apache Tomcat

seg-source.mrk: Installing Apache Tomcat

target.mrk: Apache Tomcat installieren

trans-unit.source: You can download the Apache Tomcat installation files for different operating systems at: https://tomcat.apache.org/download-80.cgi

seg-source.mrk: You can download the Apache Tomcat installation files for different operating systems at: https://tomcat.apache.org/download-80.cgi

trans-unit.source: The Apache Tomcat team announced that support for Apache Tomcat 8.0.x ended on 30th June 2018. Therefore, Signavio only supports Tomcat version 8.5.x.

seg-source.mrk: The Apache Tomcat team announced that support for Apache Tomcat 8.0.x ended on 30th June 2018.
Therefore, Signavio only supports Tomcat version 8.5.x.

target.mrk: Das Apache Tomcat Team gab bekannt, dass die Unterstützung für Apache Tomcat 8.0.x am 30. Juni 2018 beendet wurde.
Daher unterstützt Signavio ausschließlich die Tomcat-Version 8.5.x.

seg-source.mrk: Some Linux distributions allow the installation of Apache Tomcat through the package manager.
If you use Debian version 6.0 or higher, for example, you can install Tomcat as follows:

target.mrk: Außerdem bieten einige Paketverwaltungen von Linux-Distributionen die einfache Installation vom Apache Tomcat an.
Wenn Sie ein Debian Betriebssystem ab der Version 6.0 benutzen, können Sie das Advanced Packaging Tool (APT) für die Installation verwenden. Nutzen Sie den folgenden Befehl:

trans-unit.source: For Windows, Apache provides the Windows Service Installer (download the package <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">32-bit/64-bit Windows Service Installer</kbd>).

seg-source.mrk: For Windows, Apache provides the Windows Service Installer (download the package <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">32-bit/64-bit Windows Service Installer</kbd>).

trans-unit.source: This allows installing the Apache Tomcat as a windows service by using the Apache Tomcat installation wizard.

seg-source.mrk: This allows installing the Apache Tomcat as a windows service by using the Apache Tomcat installation wizard.

target.mrk: Dieser ermöglicht es Ihnen, den Apache Tomcat über einen Installations-Wizard zu installieren und direkt als Dienst auf Ihrem Windows-Server einzurichten.

trans-unit.source: After installing Tomcat through the Windows wizard, it will start up automatically at every server startup.

seg-source.mrk: After installing Tomcat through the Windows wizard, it will start up automatically at every server startup.

target.mrk: Nach der Installation von Tomcat, wird dieser bei jedem Serverstart automatisch gestartet.

trans-unit.source: When using the Windows installer, some properties can be easily configured via the administrator’s panel (see below). Therefore, we recommend the Service Installer to be used on Windows systems. Please make sure you run the Service installer with administrator rights.

seg-source.mrk: When using the Windows installer, some properties can be easily configured via the administrator’s panel (see below).
Therefore, we recommend the Service Installer to be used on Windows systems.
Please make sure you run the Service installer with administrator rights.

target.mrk: Achten Sie bei der Installation darauf, dass Sie das Installationsprogramm mit Administratorrechten ausführen.
Daher empfehlen wir den Service Installer zur Verwendung auf Windows-Systemen.
Achten Sie bei der Installation darauf, dass Sie das Installationsprogramm mit Administratorrechten ausführen.

trans-unit.source: Please make sure the executing user has got read/write permissions for the folder <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"> $TOMCAT_DIR/webapps </kbd> and all containing sub folders.

seg-source.mrk: Please make sure the executing user has got read/write permissions for the folder <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"> $TOMCAT_DIR/webapps </kbd> and all containing sub folders.

trans-unit.source: On a Windows system, we recommend installing Apache Tomcat into a root folder on <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">C:\</kbd>. That should make sure that the executing user has got read/write permissions for the respective folders.

seg-source.mrk: On a Windows system, we recommend installing Apache Tomcat into a root folder on <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">C:\</kbd>.
That should make sure that the executing user has got read/write permissions for the respective folders.

target.mrk: Das stellt sicher, dass der ausführende Nutzer später Lese-/Schreibzugriff auf die entsprechenden Ordner hat.

trans-unit.source: Configuring Apache Tomcat

seg-source.mrk: Configuring Apache Tomcat

target.mrk: Apache Tomcat konfigurieren

trans-unit.source: Allocate as much RAM as possible for Apache Tomcat. We recommend to allocate at least 4096MB RAM.

seg-source.mrk: Allocate as much RAM as possible for Apache Tomcat.
We recommend to allocate at least 4096MB RAM.

target.mrk: Weisen Sie dem Apache Tomcat so viel Arbeitsspeicher wie möglich zu.
Wir empfehlen, mindestens 4096 MB RAM zuzuweisen.

trans-unit.source: This is done by changing the JVM variable <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">Xmx</kbd> (that means executing the JVM start command with the attached parameter <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">-Xmx4096m</kbd>). When using the Apache Tomcat installer on a Windows system, you can edit JVM variables in the Apache configuration dialog.

seg-source.mrk: This is done by changing the JVM variable <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">Xmx</kbd> (that means executing the JVM start command with the attached parameter <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">-Xmx4096m</kbd>).
When using the Apache Tomcat installer on a Windows system, you can edit JVM variables in the Apache configuration dialog.

target.mrk: Wenn Sie auf einem Windows System den Installer von Apache Tomcat verwenden, dann können Sie JVM Variablen im Konfigurationsdialog von Apache Tomcat angeben.

trans-unit.source: Please ensure Apache Tomcat is using <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">UTF-8</kbd> as <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">default encoding</kbd> mechanism and has configuration editing disabled. Set the JVM variable <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">Dfile.encoding</kbd> to <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">UTF-8</kbd> and <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">-Ddisable.configEdit</kbd> to <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">true</kbd>:

seg-source.mrk: Please ensure Apache Tomcat is using <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">UTF-8</kbd> as <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">default encoding</kbd> mechanism and has configuration editing disabled.

Set the JVM variable <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">Dfile.encoding</kbd> to <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">UTF-8</kbd> and <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">-Ddisable.configEdit</kbd> to <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">true</kbd>:

trans-unit.source: On Windows , open the Windows Start menu and go to Program Files - Apache Tomcat X - Configure Tomcat.

seg-source.mrk: On Windows , open the Windows Start menu and go to Program Files - Apache Tomcat X - Configure Tomcat.

trans-unit.source: Go to the tab Java and enter the values as follows:

seg-source.mrk: Go to the tab Java and enter the values as follows:

target.mrk: Wechseln Sie in das Java-Tab und geben Sie die folgenden Werte an:

trans-unit.source: Configure Apache Tomcat

seg-source.mrk: Configure Apache Tomcat

target.mrk: Apache Tomcat konfigurieren

trans-unit.source: On Linux, create the environment variable JAVA_OPTS with the following value by executing the following command:

seg-source.mrk: On Linux, create the environment variable JAVA_OPTS with the following value by executing the following command:

trans-unit.source: For all operating systems, ensure the XML file <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"> $TOMCAT_DIR/conf/web.xml </kbd> is encoded with <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"> UTF-8 </kbd> and change the configuration if necessary.

seg-source.mrk: For all operating systems, ensure the XML file <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"> $TOMCAT_DIR/conf/web.xml </kbd> is encoded with <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"> UTF-8 </kbd> and change the configuration if necessary.

trans-unit.source: The first line of the file has to be:

seg-source.mrk: The first line of the file has to be:

target.mrk: Die erste Zeile der XML-Dateien muss wie folgt aussehen:

trans-unit.source: Additionally, add the attribute <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">URIEncoding="UTF-8"</kbd> to the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">HTTP(S) Connector</kbd> element of the file <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$TOMCAT_DIR/conf/server.xml</kbd>.

seg-source.mrk: Additionally, add the attribute <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">URIEncoding="UTF-8"</kbd> to the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">HTTP(S) Connector</kbd> element of the file <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$TOMCAT_DIR/conf/server.xml</kbd>.

trans-unit.source: To compress the information transferred, automatic compression should be enabled.

seg-source.mrk: To compress the information transferred, automatic compression should be enabled.

target.mrk: Für eine Verringerung der zu übertragenden Daten sollten Sie außerdem die automatische Komprimierung von Daten aktivieren.

trans-unit.source: Add the following attributes to the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">Connector</kbd> element:

seg-source.mrk: Add the following attributes to the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">Connector</kbd> element:

trans-unit.source: Moreover, you can configure the port the Apache Tomcat is using by setting the attribute <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">port</kbd> of the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">Connector</kbd> element. By default, the port is <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">8080</kbd>. If you want to spare users of Signavio Process Manager entering the port number to the address line of the web browser (e.g. <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">http://signavio.yourCompany.com:8080/</kbd>), change the port number to <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">80</kbd>.

seg-source.mrk: Moreover, you can configure the port the Apache Tomcat is using by setting the attribute <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">port</kbd> of the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">Connector</kbd> element.
By default, the port is <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">8080</kbd>.

If you want to spare users of Signavio Process Manager entering the port number to the address line of the web browser (e.g. <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">http://signavio.yourCompany.com:8080/</kbd>), change the port number to <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">80</kbd>.

trans-unit.source: To support diagrams that exceed 2 MB of mere textual representation, you can add the following line to the connector definition:

seg-source.mrk: To support diagrams that exceed 2 MB of mere textual representation, you can add the following line to the connector definition:

target.mrk: Um Diagramme zu unterstützen, die eine Größe von 2 MB (reines text-basiertes Datenformat) überschreiten, fügen Sie die folgende Zeile zur Konnektoren-Definition hinzu:

trans-unit.source: maxPostSize="33554432"

seg-source.mrk: maxPostSize="33554432"

trans-unit.source: Example of a fully configured connector:

seg-source.mrk: Example of a fully configured connector:

trans-unit.source: Signavio Process Manager uses the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">webapps</kbd> directory <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">ROOT</kbd>. This may cause trouble if other applications are running on the same Tomcat server. Therefore, we strongly recommend you to exclusively use the Tomcat server for Signavio Process Manager.

seg-source.mrk: Signavio Process Manager uses the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">webapps</kbd> directory <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">ROOT</kbd>.
This may cause trouble if other applications are running on the same Tomcat server.
Therefore, we strongly recommend you to exclusively use the Tomcat server for Signavio Process Manager.

target.mrk: Dies kann zu Problemen führen, wenn Sie weitere Anwendungen auf dem gleichen Tomcat-Server betreiben.
Daher raten wir davon ab, den Tomcat-Server für weitere Anwendungen zu benutzen.

trans-unit.source: If you want to use HTTPS, please ensure that the certificate is signed by a trusted certificate authority (CA) and that the JVM trusts the Tomcat's certificate. You can find further information on this topic in <MadCap:xref href="https.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Using HTTPS (optional)</MadCap:xref>.

seg-source.mrk: If you want to use HTTPS, please ensure that the certificate is signed by a trusted certificate authority (CA) and that the JVM trusts the Tomcat's certificate.
You can find further information on this topic in <MadCap:xref href="https.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Using HTTPS (optional)</MadCap:xref>.

target.mrk: Wenn Sie HTTPS verwenden wollen, stellen Sie bitte sicher, dass das Zertifikat von einer vertrauenswürdigen Certificate Authority (CA) ausgestellt wurde und stellen Sie sicher, dass die JVM, mit dem der Apache Tomcat ausgeführt wird, dem Zertifikat vertraut.

trans-unit.source: If you use multiple connectors, apply the correct settings to all of them.

seg-source.mrk: If you use multiple connectors, apply the correct settings to all of them.

target.mrk: Wenn Sie mehrere Konnektoren verwenden, wenden Sie die korrekten Einstellungen auf alle Anschlüsse an.

trans-unit.source: If you want to integrate the Tomcat server into your system via the AJP connector, please make sure the connector is UTF-8 encoded.

seg-source.mrk: If you want to integrate the Tomcat server into your system via the AJP connector, please make sure the connector is UTF-8 encoded.

target.mrk: Wenn Sie den Tomcat-Server mittels des AJP-Konnektors in ein System integrieren möchten, stellen Sie sicher, dass die Codierung des AJP-Konnektors auf UTF-8 eingestellt ist.
